metadata.name: Gravis
metadata.description: This preset removes luck completely. Pure skill. You always get the drops, and there are no rando Vlads or rings
metadata.author: Forat Negre, Wecoc, eldri7ch

alias.comment: Alias Ring of Vlad as Ghost Card
Alias Eye of Vlad as Gold Key

blockItems.comment: Remove some mediocre map items that share their icon with better ones, to prevent bait

writes.comment: Enemies always drop their item (default: uncommon, w/Arcana: rare)
Change every instance of Nice RNG into a fixed value
Open shortcut when obtaining a key [Caller]
Open shortcut when obtaining a key [Block]
Relics as drops related to food starting at orange: Block A
Relics as drops related to food starting at orange: Block B
